[id='create-sf-db-integration_{context}']
= Creating and deploying the Salesforce to database sample integration

:context: sf2db-create
To create and deploy an integration that uses the Salesforce
connection that you created and the database connection that is
provided with {prodname}, the main steps are:

* xref:sf2db-choose-start-connection_{context}[]
* xref:sf2db-choose-finish-connection_{context}[]
* xref:sf2db-add-data-mapping-step_{context}[]
* xref:sf2db-name-and-publish_{context}[]

.Prerequisites
* You registered your {prodname} environment as a Salesforce client.
* You created a {prodname} Salesforce connection.
* {prodname} is open and you are logged in. 

include::../../modules/tutorials/p_sf2db-choose-start.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::../../modules/tutorials/p_sf2db-choose-finish.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::../../modules/tutorials/p_sf2db-add-mapping-step.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::../../modules/tutorials/p_sf2db-name-and-publish.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

:context: {parent-context}
